scripts.build: rm -f build/wrattler-app.js build/wrattler-app.js.map public/wrattler-app.js public/wrattler-app.js.map && cd tools && webpack -p --config webpack.config.prod.js && cd .. && cp build/wrattler-app.js public/wrattler-app.js && cp build/wrattler-app.js.map public/wrattler-app.js.map
scripts.docs: node node_modules/typedoc/bin/typedoc --name "Wrattler API documentation" --readme src/api.md --out ../docs/api --exclude "**/+(languages|common|services|demo)/**/*" --module "commonjs" --excludeExternals src
